description: Juicy spiced chicken is a punch of flavour when paired with roasted tomatoes in this super simple dish.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spiced Chicken With Roast Tomato Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g (6) chicken thigh fillets, cut in half

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Grease and line a baking tray with baking paper. Place tomatoes on prepared tray. Drizzle with half the oil, then 1/4 cup of the balsamic glaze. Bake for 10 minutes or until collapsed slightly. Remove from oven. Season.
Meanwhile, using a mortar and pestle, pound fennel seeds until lightly crushed. Stir in the paprika. Place chicken on a plate. Coat in spice mixture.
Heat remaining oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken, cook for 3 minutes each side or until browned and cooked through. Remove from heat. Season.
Place spinach leaves on serving plates. Add chicken and any pan juices. Add tomatoes. Drizzle with remaining balsamic glaze. Serve with lemon wedges.
